mapper.insert: insert into ecs_feedback (msg_id, parent_id, user_id, user_name, user_email, msg_title, msg_type, msg_status, msg_time, message_img, order_id, msg_area, msg_content) values (#{msg_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msg_status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msg_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msg_area,jdbcType=BIT}, #{msg_content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
